meanings.definition: A disease caused by parasitic worms of the genus Schistosoma.
meanings.sent1: Schistosomiases can be prevented by avoiding contaminated water sources.
meanings.sent2: Many people in tropical regions suffer from schistosomiases.
meanings.sent3: The doctor joked that the only way to catch schistosomiases was by swimming in chocolate rivers.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against schistosomiases, education is our greatest weapon.
meanings.sent5: The impact of schistosomiases on communities is profound and often overlooked.
